description: Try our easy to follow Easy Apple Glazed Ham recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Apple Glazed Ham Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Increase oven to 200°C and bake ham, brushing with remaining glaze and pan juices every 30 minutes, for a further 1 hour 30 minutes or until ham is golden and sticky and apples and onions are softened and cooked through. If ham should begin to burn or colour too much, cover loosely with foil. Place ham, roasted apples and onions on a platter and serve scattered with rosemary sprigs.
